level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-23, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-92, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1803.03.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-141, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provides: "Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000."
